716651f-b.title: Manhattan: Bedford Street - Grove Street
716651f-b.text:
100, 102, 104 Bedford Street, east side, north of and from the
N4.E. corner of Grove Street, and showing the side of 17 Grove
Street, the frame house on the N.E. corner. No. 102 is ''Twin
Peaks'' one of a series of studio apartment houses built in the
1920's and financed by Otto Kahn.
October 25, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, five years later.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 355.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same,Bedford Street North East corner and Grove Street.
September 24,I938
P.L.Sperr,
NO REPRODTCTIONS.
716651f-b.folder: Bedford Street & Grove Street, Manhattan, NY

716650f-a.title: Manhattan: Bedford Street - Grove Street
716650f-a.text:
100 Bedford Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Grove Street. Build-
ing shown, is a frame house and is at the rear of No. 17 Grove Street; another
frame house directly on the corner. No. 100 is said to be the tiniest house
in New York City.
1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Writers Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
716650f-a.folder: Bedford Street & Grove Street, Manhattan, NY

720272f.title: Manhattan: Grove Street - Bedford Street
720272f.text:
Grove Court, an interior residential development entered
from Grove Street, between Bedford and Hudson Street's.
1940
Alexander Alland, photo
NO REPRODUCTIONS
720272f.folder: Grove Street & Bedford Street, Manhattan, NY

720275f-c.title: Manhattan: Grove Street - Bedford Street
720275f-c.text:
Grove Street, south side, west from Bedford, to Hudson Streets.
This theroughfare makes a decided turn midway between these points;
the area to to east ef same (fereground) was the eld Hering Farm,
and that to the west, the Trinity Church Farm. Upon the latter,
on the west side of Mudson Street, is St. Luke's Protestant Epis-
copal Chapel, erected 1821-4. The cernerstone for this edifice was
laid June 4, 1821. View 2 is photographed in an eastward direction
from Rudson Street. View 3 shows the gateway entrance to Grove
Court, for photo of same see files under that classification.
About 1913
March 15, 1932
October 9, 1938.
Eugene L. Armbruster Cell.
1AY SE REPRODUNCL1
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTION
George D. Chinn
NO RDPRODUCTION
720275f-c.folder: Grove Street & Bedford Street, Manhattan, NY

716655f-a.title: Manhattan: Bedford Street - Grove Street
716655f-a.text:
Bedford Street, adjoining the N. E. corner of Grove
Street, showing two distinctive Greenwich Village
structures. The low frame shack at the right is
better known as the ''Doll House''. The odder type
at the left is an apartment structure bearing No.
102 Bedford Street.
1940
Alexander Alland, photo
NO REPRODUCTIONS
